  • Method Details

    • appendIdentitySelectToInsert

      public String appendIdentitySelectToInsert(String insertSQL)
      Use insert table(...) values(...) select SCOPE_IDENTITY()

      Provided we IdentityColumnSupport.supportsInsertSelectIdentity(), then attach the "select identity" clause to the insert statement.

      Note, if IdentityColumnSupport.supportsInsertSelectIdentity() == false then the insert-string should be returned without modification.

      Specified by:
      appendIdentitySelectToInsert in interface IdentityColumnSupport
      Overrides:
      appendIdentitySelectToInsert in class AbstractTransactSQLIdentityColumnSupport
      Parameters:
      insertSQL - The insert command
      Returns:
      The insert command with any necessary identity select clause attached.
